title: Homer and the Wacky Doughnut Machine
description: A mechanically minded youngster accidentally converts his uncle's malfunctioning doughnut maker into a nonstop producer.

title: The Winged Colt
description: A young boy travels out west and encounters a magical winged-horse

title: Tales of the Nunundaga
description: Story of tribal Indians on the Great Plains before the arrival of the white man, centering on one family.

title: The Escape of a One-Ton Pet
Soup and Me
description: On the day of the Halloween party, boys Soup and Rob are finding plenty of ways to get into trouble: swimming in a local pond (though their mothers prohibit swimming so late in the year), pitching apples over a barn, and borrowing a cart which had drifted away from its owner. The grandest mischief of all, however, comes from their attempt to win the prize at the Halloween party, given to the entrant with the largest pumpkin.

title: The Puppy Who Wanted a Boy
The Seven Wishes of Joanna Peabody
description: Joanna Peabody is granted 7 wishes by "Aunt Thelma", a wise fairy-godmother who appears on Joanna's TV screen. Joanna squanders a few wishes before she learns the value of sharing.

title: The Contest Kid and the Big Prize
If I'm Lost, How Come I Found You?
Little Lulu
description: An ABC Weekend Special, based on the 1935 single-panel comic strip by Marjorie Henderson Buell.

title: Soup for President
description: Rob helps Soup run for class president.

title: The Big Hex of Little Lulu
description: Two-part sequel to the 1978 ABC Weekend Special, based on the Marjorie Henderson Buell comic strip. In this one, Lulu Moppet wants to start an all-girls hockey team, but is short on funds for uniforms and equipment, until she cons chauvanistic Tubby into believing he has a curse, which can only be lifted by raising money for the team.

title: The Ghost of Thomas Kempe
description: Poor James Harrison! Everyone is upset with him - his parents, the next-door neighbor, even the town sheriff - but he didn't do anything wrong! The real culprit is Thomas Kempe, a sorcerer from a prior century who's been unwittingly released from an antique bottle. Young James, after moving into a charming Victorian home with his family, finds that he has an invisible roommate - the ghost of Thomas Kempe. The ghost needs an apprentice, but when James refuses to cooperate, accidents and mysterious events plague the neighborhood. Coincidentally, all the clues point to James as the guilty party! Fortunately, a friend volunteers to help the boy lure the mischief-loving spirit back to his resting place. But even if the two succeed, will anyone believe the explanation?

title: The Incredible Detectives
description: When a young boy is abducted from a museum, his pet bulldog, Siamese cat and crow team up to rescue him.

title: The Gold Bug
description: Shortly after the Civil War, while exploring the long deserted and reputedly haunted Sullivan's Island off Charleston S.C., a boy encounters two obsessed eccentrics living there. These men chase him away and warn him never to return or to tell anyone about them. Soon, however, they locate him and summon him back, because he has unknowingly given them a clue vital to their quest and they need his help to unravel the rest of the mystery. If he can do so, they will find buried pirate treasure and all become rich. But in joining the search, he falls under the same obsession and curse-- an ominous fate suggested by the unearthly electronic music which contributes to the film's atmosphere.

title: The Trouble with Miss Switch
description: When Rupert and his friend Amelia find the new substitute teacher doing odd things, they discover that she is actually a witch with a magical talking cat who sought them out in order to stop an evil coven of witches from destroying her.

title: Arthur the Kid
description: Three inept crooks, endeavoring to become big-name Western outlaws, advertise for a gang leader. The newspaper squib only attracts the interest of a young boy who nevertheless manages to make them famous.

title: Mayday! Mayday!
description: Mayday! Mayday! is the distress call given by pilot Lou Parker just before the small plane carrying Lou and his family is forced to make a crash landing in the high Sierras. With Lou trapped in the wreckage and his wife, Janice immobilized by a broken leg, young Allison and Mark Parker set out alone to find help. Unknown to the children or the airborne searchers, back at the crash site their injured mother is waging a desperate battle against a stream of fuel flowing from the wreckage toward her signal fire. The prospects of rescue become increasingly dim as Allison and Mark struggle to elude a pack of wild dogs and encounter a rattlesnake ready to strike.

title: The Notorious Jumping Frog of Calaveras County
Bunnicula, the Vampire Rabbit
description: When strange accidents happen at the factory where Mr. Monroe works, and vegetables are drained of their juices, the neighbors as well as Harold the dog and Chester the cat suspect that the new-found family bunny is really a vampire.

title: The Haunted Mansion Mystery
description: When Angel Wilson and her family move into a spooky old house, their new neighbour Billy informs her the place is haunted by an old miser -- who is rumored to have disappeared with a million dollars in cash. Learning of a secret room in the mansion's basement, the two sleuths make an astonishing discovery -- only to be trapped by a near-fatal cave-in. Now, they'll have to solve the mansion's baffling mystery, or end up missing...just like the miser and his legendary loot!

title: The Red Room Riddle
description: This episode was hosted by the ventriloquist Willie Tyler,& his dummy "Lester".Two young boys, Todd & Bill, go snooping into an alleged haunted house as a club initiation.One of the upstairs rooms was supposedly inhabiting a ghost by the name of Jamie Bly, who was a young boy who burned in the room years before.He had a dog, as well.The entire mansion was filled with ghosts, from Bly, to his old caretaker, to the maid, to everything.This episode featured the misadventures of the two boys as they entered the property & wandered inside the mansion.

title: Horatio Alger Updated: Frank and Fearless
All the Money in the World
description: A young boy gets a wish from a leprechaun, and wishes for all the money in the world. He then learns about the real-life ramifications of such a wish.

title: The Dog Days of Arthur Cane
Henry Hamilton Graduate Ghost
description: A ghost who just graduated from Spiritual Specter University gets his first haunting assignment.

title: The Bollo Caper
description: Bollo, a leopard brought to New York to be made into a fur coat, manages to escape to Washington to try to get Congress to declare him an endangered species.

title: The Adventures of a Two-Minute Werewolf
The Return of the Bunjee
description: Karen, Andy and Bunjee are determined to find a mom for the little Bunjee babies. The time machine sends them to the Middle Ages, where they tangle with an evil sorceress, battle a three-headed dragon -- and have more fun than a barrel of Bunjees!

title: The Adventures of Con Sawyer and Hucklemary Finn
description: Two pre-teenaged girls attempted to thwart a robbery.

title: Jeeter Mason and the Magic Headset
Cap'n O.G. Readmore's Jack and the Beanstalk
The Adventures of Teddy Ruxpin
description: Teddy Ruxpin, a bear-like creature called a Illiop; Grubby, a caterpillar; and Prince Arin set forth to see the world and battle evil along the way.

title: Cap'n O.G. Readmore Meets Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
The Day the Kids Took Over
Liberty and the Littles
description: The Littles help rescue another family of tiny people living in the Statue Of Liberty.

title: The Mouse and the Motorcycle
description: A lonely boy befriends a talking mouse who falls in love with his toy motorcycle.

title: Cap'n O.G. Readmore Meets Red Riding Hood
Cap'n O.G. Readmore's Puss in Boots
Runaway Ralph
description: Ralph the Mouse runs away from home and befriends a young outcast at summer camp.

title: Otherwise Known as Sheila the Great
Choose Your Own Adventure: The Case of the Silk King
The Legend of Lochnagar
description: Prince Charles tells a group of children, the story of the Old Man of Lochnager based on the book he wrote.

title: Cap'n O.G. Readmore Meets Chicken Little
The Secret Garden
description: Animated TV-film version of Frances Hodgson Burnett's classic children's story about a spoiled English orphan who lives in India but is transplanted to her uncle's old, mysterious house in England after her parents' deaths. After making friends with a country boy and several animals, who talk here, she discovers many secrets on the grounds, including a locked-up, neglected garden and a locked-up, sickly boy, who turns out to be her cousin. Far too much time is spent here on the children's attempts to save the sickly boy's life from the evil housekeeper and doctor, who want to kill him and inherit the house.

title: The Secret of Lizard Woman
description: A teenage boy's search for his uncle on a Navajo reservation discovers his own Native American heritage.
